Headline: Temporary Westbound #103 West 103rd  Reroute near 103rd/Pulaski
ShortDescription: Westbound 103 West 103rd buses are temporarily rerouted near 103rd/Pulaski.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Westbound #103 West 103rd buses are temporarily rerouted via 103rd, Pulaski, 100th layover Brother Rice High School, Pulaski, 103rd, and resume normal route, due to street blockage near 103rd/Pulaski.

Eastbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #95 95th Temporary Reroute at 95th/Stony Island
ShortDescription: 95 95th buses are temporarily rerouted via 95th, Stony Island, 94th, Kenwood, 93rd, Cottage Grove and 95th: due to, police activity near 95th/Stony Island.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How does this affect my trip?

 

#95 95th buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via 95th, Stony Island, 94th, Kenwood, 93rd, Cottage Grove, 95th and over regular route due to police activity near 95th/Stony Island.

Allow extra travel time.
